item.title: Product Video Background Removal - Upwork
item.description:
I have 9 product video captures (ProRes 6k) on a turnstyle completing 360 degree rotations. Simple. I need the background masked or keyed out so the only thing visible is the product rotating.
The footage is not green screened and thus cannot be chroma keyed. This will probably have to be done manually (unless you know a trick or two that would expedite and simplify the process). I've already done one clip in AfterEffects myself, but don't have time to do the others.
The footage is actually quite clean and the products are pretty-well centered on the turnstyle, so keying isn't difficult.
The result should be 6k renders at with either transparency or against pure black so I can remove the background when compositing on top of other footage.

Hourly Range: $45.00-$75.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 23:10 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Avid Media Composer, Maxon Cinema 4D, Rotoscoping, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Avid Media Composer, Maxon Cinema 4D, Rotoscoping, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Videographer for Video Course in Los Angeles - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled videographer to help us in recording a video course consisting of eight video lessons in Los Angeles. The ideal candidate should have experience in shooting instructional videos and be familiar with the equipment and techniques required to capture high-quality footage. The videographer will be responsible for setting up and operating the camera, ensuring proper lighting and sound, and capturing different angles and shots to enhance the learning experience. Attention to detail and the ability to work independently are essential. This is an exciting opportunity to contribute to an educational project and showcase your expertise in videography.

Skills required:
- Videography
- Camera operation
- Lighting setup
- Sound recording
- Attention to detail

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 26, 2024 22:41 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Videography, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
